reviewText:
Written as someone who has taken knitting workshops from Meg Swansen, this video is almost exactly what you would get from  her in a live class. Clear instructions, good video quality, reminders not to stress out and lots of helpful tips.

This is an excellent learning tool as there are lots of close ups as Meg actually works on the project. I'm a pretty visual learner so this was just what I was looking for.

It is a fairly slow paced video - great for a knitter trying to work along - so don't try to get your non-knitting partner to watch along with you. Mine fell asleep . . .
